channel.title: Hacker on Second State News and Articles
channel.description: Recent content in Hacker on Second State News and Articles

item.title: Team HITCON, with Second State's developer as a core, scored the second in DEF CON
item.description: Taiwanese hacker team HITCON scored the second in world’s most prestigious hacking competition DEF CON Capture the Flag in Las Vegas. A core team member is a software developer at Second State Inc. In the just-concluded DEF CON 27 CTF hacking contest, after three days and two nights of “competition”, HITCON & BFKinesiS team from Taiwan defeated Team Tea deliverses and A*0*E from Tencent and won the runner-up. The core member of the HITCON team is also a software engineers at Second State.
